title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.23 - Wrecked or disabled aircraft to be removed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.23 - Wrecked or disabled aircraft to be removed

State Regulations

The operator of any wrecked or disabled aircraft at the
airport shall be responsible for the prompt disposal of such aircraft and the
parts thereof as directed by the airport operator. In the event of his failure
to comply with such directions, such wrecked or disabled aircraft and the parts
thereof may be removed by the airport operator at the operators expense and
without liability for damage which may result in the course of such
removal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
